page.title: 06People in Cantley.
page.content:
Distances Travelled to Work.
Out of{205}people surveyed{151}were {car owners: {96}people{0-5 miles 45}people{6-10 {19}people{11-20 miles 8}people{21-30 {13}people{more than 30 miles. Local Facilities. Out of{52}people surveyed: {52}use{Local shops {27}use the{Library {32}use the{Health Centre {43}said{services are good {29}said{too much litter {45 lived in the area more than 8 years {48}said{good place to live {27 worked locally in service { industries {51}agreed the need for{more amenities such as supermarkets,comunity centre,a sports centre and a School Nursery.
